channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [TINKERPOP-2196] PartitionStrategy with includeMetaProperties(true) can't add labeled vertex
item.description:
graph = TinkerGraph.open()

g1 = graph.traversal().withStrategies(PartitionStrategy.build().partitionKey("_partition").writePartition("1").readPartitions("1").create())
v1 = g1.addV("node").next() // OK
v2 = g1.addV("node").next() // OK

g2 = graph.traversal().withStrategies(PartitionStrategy.build().partitionKey("_partition").writePartition("1").readPartitions("1").includeMetaProperties(true).create())
g2.addV() // OK
g2.addE("link").from(v1).to(v2) // OK
g2.addV("node") // Exception

Trying to add a labeled vertex through a PartitionStrategy that is partitioning meta-properties fails. Adding a non-labeled vertex or a labeled edge succeeds.

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.T$1 cannot be cast to java.lang.String

(TINKERPOP-2188 may be related.)
item.summary: PartitionStrategy with includeMetaProperties(true) can't add labeled vertex

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
spmallette commented on pull request #1099: TINKERPOP-2196 Fixed PartitionStrategy when setting vertex label
URL: https://github.com/apache/tinkerpop/pull/1099

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TINKERPOP-2196

If includeMetaProperties is enabled and vertex label set then an error would follow because T.label was not being properly accounted for. You can't check cardinality for T.

Built with `mvn clean install -DincludeNeo4j`

VOTE +1
